00035 typedef struct _BUSIOPDATA

00037     int                    MasterID;
00038     unsigned long          Address;

00041     int                    bRemap;

00043 } BUSIOPDATA;

00057 #define NB_MASTER 16 
00058 #define MAX_IRQ 16

00066 #define BARS 3
00067 #define BAR0 0
00068 #define BAR2 2
00069 
00071 #define APE_CHDMA_TABLE_SIZE (4096)
00072 /* single transfer must not exceed 255 table entries. worst case this can be
00073  * achieved by 255 scattered pages, with only a single byte in the head and
00074  * tail pages. 253 * PAGE_SIZE is a safe upper bound for the transfer size.
00075  */
00076 #define PAGE_SHIFT      12
00077 #define PAGE_SZ (1UL << PAGE_SHIFT)
00078 #define APE_CHDMA_MAX_TRANSFER_LEN (253 * PAGE_SZ)
00079 #define NB_TABLE 2 //MTQ
00080 #define DMA_TRANSFERT NB_TABLE*PAGE_SZ* 0x4 // a revoir si dmasz > 1000
00081 #define DATA_SIZE 2*DMA_TRANSFERT // Pour les 2 fibres
00082 #define OFFSET_FIBER1 DMA_TRANSFERT
00083 #define OFFSET_FIBER0 0
00084 
00085 #define OUTPUT_FIFO_OUT_FIFO_DEPTH 512
00086 #define ALMOST_EMPTY 2
00087 //#define ALMOST_FULL OUTPUT_FIFO_OUT_FIFO_DEPTH-5
00088 #define ALMOST_FULL 2 
00089 #define IT_FIFO   1 
00090 #define IT_STATUS 2
00091 static const unsigned long bar_min_len[BARS] = { 4194304, 0, 32768 }; // see lspci -v
00092 // StratixII registers adddress
00093 
00094 #define TRANS_TABLE_OFFSET 0x1000
00095 
00096 #define ENABLE  0x10
00097 #define DISABLE 0xFFFFFFEF
00098

00100 #define HALF_WORD               0x2

00102 #define GO                      0x8
00103 #define IRQ                     0x10
00104 #define READ_ENDS_TRANSACTION   0x20
00105 #define WRITE_ENDS_TRANSACTION  0x40
00106 #define LENGHT_ENDS_TRANSACTION 0x80
00107 #define READ_FROM_CONST_ADDR    0x100
00108 #define WRITE_TO_CONST_ADDR     0x200
00109 #define DOUBLE_WORD             0x400
00110 #define QUAD_WORD               0x800
00111 #define SOFT_RESET              0x1000

00141 /* OLD version
00142 #define  PCI_EXPRESS_REGISTER 0x40
00143 #define  AVALON_DMA_CONTROLLER 0x4000
00144 #define  CHIP_MEM_BASE0 0x200000
00145 #define  PIO_IN 0x4040
00146 #define  SPECSM0_MEM    0x5000
00147 */
00148 /* NEw version
00149 #define  PCI_EXPRESS_REGISTER 0x40
00150 #define  AVALON_DMA_CONTROLLER 0x4000
00151 #define  CHIP_MEM_BASE0 0x8000
00152 #define  SPECSM0_MEM    0x6000
00153 #define  PIO_IN 0x20
00154 #define TX_ADDR 0x20000000
00155 */
00156 #if  DRIVER_VERSION == 1001113 
00157 #define BASE_ADDRESS 0
00158 #define  PCI_EXPRESS_REGISTER 0x40 
00159 #define  AVALON_DMA_CONTROLLER 0x4020
00160 #define  CHIP_MEM_BASE0 0x202000
00161 #define  SPECSM0_MEM    0x200000
00162 #define  PIO_IN 0x4060  + BASE_ADDRESS
00163 #define  TX_ADDR 0x0
00164 #define  VERSION 0x4040 + BASE_ADDRESS
00165 #define  PIO_CTRL_REG 0x4000 + BASE_ADDRESS
00166 #define  PIO_STATUS_REG 0x4060 + BASE_ADDRESS
00167 #define  FIFO_RECEPTION_IN 0x4070 + BASE_ADDRESS
00168 #define  FIFO_EMISSION_OUT 0x4074 +BASE_ADDRESS
00169 #define  RESET 0x4050 +BASE_ADDRESS 
00170 #endif

00218 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_REC_IN_STATUS      0x20                    // FIFO_RECEPTION_STATUS - FIFO_RECEPTION_IN  
00219 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_EMI_OUT_STATUS     0x10                    // FIFO_EMISSION_OUT - FIFO_EMISSION_STATUS
00220 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_IN_CTRL            0x60                    // FIFO_RECEPTION_IN - PIO_CTRL_REG

00242 #define MEM_TEST               (   0x800 + BASE_ADDRESS )
00243 #define  PIO_CTRL_REG         (  0x100 + BASE_ADDRESS  )
00244 #define  PIO_STATUS_REG        ( 0x120 + BASE_ADDRESS  )

00246 #define  FIFO_EMISSION_STATUS  ( 0x140 + BASE_ADDRESS )

00252 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_REC_IN_STATUS      0x20                    // FIFO_RECEPTION_STATUS - FIFO_RECEPTION_IN    
00253 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_EMI_OUT_STATUS     0x10                    // FIFO_EMISSION_OUT - FIFO_EMISSION_STATUS
00254 #define  OFFSET_FIFO_IN_CTRL            0x60      // FIFO_RECEPTION_IN - PIO_CTRL_REG
00255 #define  MASK_FIFO_IN 0x7F // Pour trouver si c'est une addresse FIFO_RECEPTION_IN
